member.name: T:MimeCheck.AspNetCore.Attributes.AllowedCategoriesAttribute
member.summary: Validates that the uploaded file belongs to one of the allowed categories.

member.summary: Gets the allowed categories.

member.summary: Gets or sets whether to require a known file type. Default is true.

member.summary: Validates that the uploaded file's MIME type matches one of the allowed types. Supports wildcard patterns like "image/*".

member.summary: Gets the allowed MIME types.

member.name: P:MimeCheck.AspNetCore.Attributes.AllowedMimeTypesAttribute.RequireKnownType
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to require a known file type. Default is true.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance with the specified allowed MIME types.

member.summary: Validates the file's MIME type.

member.summary: Validates that the uploaded file's MIME type is not one of the denied types. Supports wildcard patterns like "application/*".

member.summary: Gets the denied MIME types.

member.summary: Validates the file's MIME type.

member.summary: Middleware for validating MIME types of uploaded files.

member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

member.name: M:MimeCheck.AspNetCore.Middleware.MimeValidationMiddleware.InvokeAsync(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.HttpContext,MimeCheck.AspNetCore.Services.IMimeValidationService)
member.summary: Invokes the middleware.

member.name: T:MimeCheck.AspNetCore.MimeValidationOptions
member.summary: Configuration options for MIME validation in ASP.NET Core.

member.name: P:MimeCheck.AspNetCore.MimeValidationOptions.AllowedMimeTypes
member.summary: Gets or sets the allowed MIME types for file uploads. Supports wildcards like "image/*". If empty, all types are allowed (unless denied).

member.name: P:MimeCheck.AspNetCore.MimeValidationOptions.DeniedMimeTypes
member.summary: Gets or sets the denied MIME types for file uploads.

member.name: P:MimeCheck.AspNetCore.MimeValidationOptions.AllowedCategories
member.summary: Gets or sets the allowed file categories. Default is All.

member.name: P:MimeCheck.AspNetCore.MimeValidationOptions.DeniedCategories
member.summary: Gets or sets the denied file categories. Default is Unknown (no categories denied).

member.name: P:MimeCheck.AspNetCore.MimeValidationOptions.MaxFileSizeBytes
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum file size in bytes. Default is 0 (no limit).

member.name: P:MimeCheck.AspNetCore.MimeValidationOptions.MinFileSizeBytes
member.summary: Gets or sets the minimum file size in bytes. Default is 0 (no minimum).

member.name: P:MimeCheck.AspNetCore.MimeValidationOptions.RequireKnownType
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to require a known file type. Default is false.

member.name: P:MimeCheck.AspNetCore.MimeValidationOptions.ValidateExtension
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to validate that file extensions match detected types. Default is false.

member.name: P:MimeCheck.AspNetCore.MimeValidationOptions.EnableMiddleware
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to enable the validation middleware. Default is true.

member.name: P:MimeCheck.AspNetCore.MimeValidationOptions.IncludePaths
member.summary: Gets or sets the paths to apply validation to. If empty, validation applies to all paths with file uploads.

member.name: P:MimeCheck.AspNetCore.MimeValidationOptions.ExcludePaths
member.summary: Gets or sets the paths to exclude from validation.

member.name: M:MimeCheck.AspNetCore.MimeValidationOptions.AllowImagesOnly
member.summary: Configures options to allow only images.

member.name: M:MimeCheck.AspNetCore.MimeValidationOptions.AllowDocumentsOnly
member.summary: Configures options to allow only documents.

member.name: M:MimeCheck.AspNetCore.MimeValidationOptions.DenyExecutables
member.summary: Configures options to deny executables.

member.name: M:MimeCheck.AspNetCore.MimeValidationOptions.WithMaxSizeMB(System.Int64)
member.summary: Sets the maximum file size in megabytes.

member.summary: Adds MimeCheck validation services configured for image uploads only.

member.summary: Adds MimeCheck validation services configured for document uploads only.
member.param: Maximum file size in megabytes. Default is 25MB.

member.summary: Adds MimeCheck validation services that deny executable files.

member.summary: Uses the MimeCheck validation middleware.

member.summary: Represents the result of a MIME type detection operation.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether a MIME type was successfully detected.

member.name: P:MimeCheck.Detection.DetectionResult.MimeType
member.summary: Gets the detected MIME type, or null if detection failed.

member.name: P:MimeCheck.Detection.DetectionResult.Category
member.summary: Gets the detected file category.

member.name: P:MimeCheck.Detection.DetectionResult.Extension
member.summary: Gets the primary file extension for the detected type (including the dot).

member.name: P:MimeCheck.Detection.DetectionResult.AlternativeExtensions
member.summary: Gets alternative file extensions for the detected type.

member.name: P:MimeCheck.Detection.DetectionResult.Description
member.summary: Gets a human-readable description of the detected file type.

member.name: P:MimeCheck.Detection.DetectionResult.Confidence
member.summary: Gets the confidence level of the detection (0-100). Higher values indicate more specific/certain matches.

member.name: P:MimeCheck.Detection.DetectionResult.MatchedSignature
member.summary: Gets the signature that matched, if any.

member.name: P:MimeCheck.Detection.DetectionResult.Unknown
member.summary: Gets a result representing an unknown/undetected file type.

member.summary: Creates a successful detection result from a matched signature.

member.summary: Returns a string representation of this detection result.

member.summary: Gets or sets the default number of bytes to read for detection.

member.summary: Detects the MIME type from a file asynchronously.

member.returns: The file category, or Unknown if not found.

member.returns: True if the extension is in the database; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:MimeCheck.Signatures.Categories.ArchiveSignatures
member.summary: Contains magic byte signatures for archive file formats.

member.name: T:MimeCheck.Signatures.Categories.AudioSignatures
member.summary: Contains magic byte signatures for audio file formats.

member.name: T:MimeCheck.Signatures.Categories.DocumentSignatures
member.summary: Contains magic byte signatures for document file formats.

member.name: T:MimeCheck.Signatures.Categories.ExecutableSignatures
member.summary: Contains magic byte signatures for executable file formats.

member.name: T:MimeCheck.Signatures.Categories.FontSignatures
member.summary: Contains magic byte signatures for font file formats.

member.name: T:MimeCheck.Signatures.Categories.ImageSignatures
member.summary: Contains magic byte signatures for image file formats.

member.name: T:MimeCheck.Signatures.Categories.OtherSignatures
member.summary: Contains magic byte signatures for other file formats (database, text, etc.).

member.name: T:MimeCheck.Signatures.Categories.VideoSignatures
member.summary: Contains magic byte signatures for video file formats.

member.name: T:MimeCheck.Signatures.MimeSignature
member.summary: Represents a file signature (magic bytes) used to identify file types.

member.name: P:MimeCheck.Signatures.MimeSignature.MimeType
member.summary: Gets the MIME type associated with this signature.

member.name: P:MimeCheck.Signatures.MimeSignature.Category
member.summary: Gets the file category.

member.name: P:MimeCheck.Signatures.MimeSignature.MagicBytes
member.summary: Gets the magic bytes that identify this file type.

member.name: P:MimeCheck.Signatures.MimeSignature.Offset
member.summary: Gets the offset from the start of the file where the magic bytes should be found. Default is 0 (start of file).

member.name: P:MimeCheck.Signatures.MimeSignature.Extension
member.summary: Gets the primary file extension for this MIME type (including the dot).

member.name: P:MimeCheck.Signatures.MimeSignature.AlternativeExtensions
member.summary: Gets alternative file extensions for this MIME type.

member.name: P:MimeCheck.Signatures.MimeSignature.Description
member.summary: Gets a human-readable description of the file type.

member.name: P:MimeCheck.Signatures.MimeSignature.Mask
member.summary: Gets the optional mask to apply when comparing bytes. If null, all bytes must match exactly.

member.name: P:MimeCheck.Signatures.MimeSignature.Priority
member.summary: Gets the priority for matching. Higher values are checked first. Useful for distinguishing between formats with similar signatures (e.g., ZIP-based formats).

member.name: P:MimeCheck.Signatures.MimeSignature.AdditionalChecks
member.summary: Gets additional bytes to check for more specific identification. Used for formats like Office documents that are ZIP-based.

member.name: M:MimeCheck.Signatures.MimeSignature.Matches(System.ReadOnlySpan{System.Byte})
member.summary: Checks if the provided bytes match this signature.
member.returns: True if the data matches this signature; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:MimeCheck.Signatures.MimeSignature.GetAllExtensions
member.summary: Gets all extensions (primary and alternatives) for this signature.

member.name: T:MimeCheck.Signatures.AdditionalCheck
member.summary: Represents an additional check for more specific file type identification.

member.name: P:MimeCheck.Signatures.AdditionalCheck.Bytes
member.summary: Gets the bytes to look for.

member.name: P:MimeCheck.Signatures.AdditionalCheck.Offset
member.summary: Gets the offset where to look for the bytes.

member.name: P:MimeCheck.Signatures.AdditionalCheck.SearchAnywhere
member.summary: Gets whether to search for the bytes anywhere in the file (up to a limit).

member.name: P:MimeCheck.Signatures.AdditionalCheck.SearchLimit
member.summary: Gets the maximum bytes to search when SearchAnywhere is true.

member.name: T:MimeCheck.Signatures.SignatureDatabase
member.summary: Provides access to the database of file signatures for MIME type detection.

member.name: P:MimeCheck.Signatures.SignatureDatabase.Signatures
member.summary: Gets all registered file signatures, ordered by priority (highest first).

member.name: P:MimeCheck.Signatures.SignatureDatabase.ByMimeType
member.summary: Gets signatures indexed by MIME type.

member.name: P:MimeCheck.Signatures.SignatureDatabase.ByExtension
member.summary: Gets signatures indexed by file extension.

member.name: P:MimeCheck.Signatures.SignatureDatabase.ByCategory
member.summary: Gets signatures indexed by category.

member.name: P:MimeCheck.Signatures.SignatureDatabase.MaxBytesNeeded
member.summary: Gets the maximum number of bytes needed to identify any file type.

member.name: M:MimeCheck.Signatures.SignatureDatabase.GetByCategory(MimeCheck.MimeCategory)
member.summary: Gets all signatures for a specific category.
member.returns: An array of signatures matching the category.

member.name: M:MimeCheck.Signatures.SignatureDatabase.GetByMimeType(System.String)
member.summary: Gets signatures by MIME type.
member.param: The MIME type to search for.
member.returns: An array of signatures matching the MIME type, or empty array if not found.

member.name: M:MimeCheck.Signatures.SignatureDatabase.GetByExtension(System.String)
member.summary: Gets signatures by file extension.
member.param: The file extension (with or without leading dot).
member.returns: An array of signatures matching the extension, or empty array if not found.

member.name: M:MimeCheck.Signatures.SignatureDatabase.GetMimeTypeForExtension(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the MIME type for a file extension.
member.param: The file extension (with or without leading dot).
member.returns: The MIME type, or null if not found.

member.name: M:MimeCheck.Signatures.SignatureDatabase.GetAllExtensions
member.summary: Gets all supported file extensions.
member.returns: A collection of all supported file extensions.

member.name: M:MimeCheck.Signatures.SignatureDatabase.GetAllMimeTypes
member.summary: Gets all supported MIME types.
member.returns: A collection of all supported MIME types.

member.name: T:MimeCheck.Validation.MimeValidator
member.summary: Provides static methods for MIME type detection and validation.

member.summary: Detects the MIME type from a byte array.
member.param: The byte array containing file content.

member.summary: Detects the MIME type from a byte span.
member.param: The byte span containing file content.

member.name: M:MimeCheck.Validation.MimeValidator.Detect(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Detects the MIME type from a stream.

member.summary: Detects the MIME type from a stream asynchronously.

member.summary: Detects the MIME type from a file.

member.name: M:MimeCheck.Validation.MimeValidator.DetectFromFileAsync(System.String,System.Threading.CancellationToken)
member.summary: Detects the MIME type from a file asynchronously.

member.name: M:MimeCheck.Validation.MimeValidator.GetMimeType(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Gets the MIME type string from a byte array.
member.param: The byte array containing file content.
member.returns: The MIME type string, or "application/octet-stream" if unknown.

member.name: M:MimeCheck.Validation.MimeValidator.GetMimeType(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Gets the MIME type string from a stream.
member.returns: The MIME type string, or "application/octet-stream" if unknown.

member.name: M:MimeCheck.Validation.MimeValidator.GetMimeType(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the MIME type string from a file.
member.returns: The MIME type string, or "application/octet-stream" if unknown.

member.name: M:MimeCheck.Validation.MimeValidator.IsValid(System.Byte[],System.String)
member.summary: Checks if the data matches a specific MIME type.
member.param: The byte array containing file content.
member.returns: True if the detected MIME type matches; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:MimeCheck.Validation.MimeValidator.IsValid(System.IO.Stream,System.String)
member.summary: Checks if the stream content matches a specific MIME type.
member.returns: True if the detected MIME type matches; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:MimeCheck.Validation.MimeValidator.IsValid(System.Byte[],System.String[])
member.summary: Checks if the data matches any of the specified MIME types.
member.param: The byte array containing file content.
member.returns: True if the detected MIME type matches any allowed type; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:MimeCheck.Validation.MimeValidator.IsValid(System.IO.Stream,System.String[])
member.summary: Checks if the stream content matches any of the specified MIME types.
member.returns: True if the detected MIME type matches any allowed type; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:MimeCheck.Validation.MimeValidator.IsImage(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Checks if the data is an image.

member.name: M:MimeCheck.Validation.MimeValidator.IsImage(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Checks if the stream content is an image.

member.name: M:MimeCheck.Validation.MimeValidator.IsDocument(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Checks if the data is a document.

member.name: M:MimeCheck.Validation.MimeValidator.IsDocument(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Checks if the stream content is a document.

member.name: M:MimeCheck.Validation.MimeValidator.IsArchive(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Checks if the data is an archive.

member.name: M:MimeCheck.Validation.MimeValidator.IsArchive(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Checks if the stream content is an archive.

member.name: M:MimeCheck.Validation.MimeValidator.IsAudio(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Checks if the data is audio.

member.name: M:MimeCheck.Validation.MimeValidator.IsAudio(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Checks if the stream content is audio.

member.name: M:MimeCheck.Validation.MimeValidator.IsVideo(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Checks if the data is video.

member.name: M:MimeCheck.Validation.MimeValidator.IsVideo(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Checks if the stream content is video.

member.name: M:MimeCheck.Validation.MimeValidator.IsExecutable(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Checks if the data is an executable.

member.name: M:MimeCheck.Validation.MimeValidator.IsExecutable(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Checks if the stream content is an executable.

member.name: M:MimeCheck.Validation.MimeValidator.IsCategory(System.Byte[],MimeCheck.MimeCategory)
member.summary: Checks if the data belongs to the specified category.

member.name: M:MimeCheck.Validation.MimeValidator.IsCategory(System.IO.Stream,MimeCheck.MimeCategory)
member.summary: Checks if the stream content belongs to the specified category.

member.name: M:MimeCheck.Validation.MimeValidator.FromBytes(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Creates a validation builder from a byte array.
member.param: The byte array containing file content.

member.summary: Creates a validation builder from a stream.

member.name: M:MimeCheck.Validation.MimeValidator.FromFile(System.String)
member.summary: Creates a validation builder from a file.

member.name: M:MimeCheck.Validation.MimeValidator.MatchesMimeType(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Checks if a MIME type matches a pattern (supports wildcards like "image/*").

member.name: M:MimeCheck.Validation.MimeValidator.GetMimeTypeForExtension(System.String)
member.summary: Gets the MIME type for a file extension from the signature database.
member.param: The file extension (with or without leading dot).
member.returns: The MIME type, or null if not found.

member.name: M:MimeCheck.Validation.MimeValidator.GetSupportedExtensions
member.summary: Gets all supported file extensions.

member.name: M:MimeCheck.Validation.MimeValidator.GetSupportedMimeTypes
member.summary: Gets all supported MIME types.

member.name: T:MimeCheck.Validation.MimeValidatorBuilder
member.summary: Provides a fluent interface for building MIME validation rules.

member.name: M:MimeCheck.Validation.MimeValidatorBuilder.WithData(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Sets the byte array to validate.

member.name: M:MimeCheck.Validation.MimeValidatorBuilder.WithStream(System.IO.Stream)
member.summary: Sets the stream to validate.

member.name: M:MimeCheck.Validation.MimeValidatorBuilder.WithFile(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the file path to validate.

member.name: M:MimeCheck.Validation.MimeValidatorBuilder.WithFileName(System.String)
member.summary: Sets the original file name (for extension validation).

member.name: M:MimeCheck.Validation.MimeValidatorBuilder.WithFileSize(System.Int64)
member.summary: Sets the file size (if not determinable from input).

member.name: M:MimeCheck.Validation.MimeValidatorBuilder.AllowMimeTypes(System.String[])
member.summary: Allows only the specified MIME types. Supports wildcards like "image/*".

member.name: M:MimeCheck.Validation.MimeValidatorBuilder.AllowCategories(MimeCheck.MimeCategory)
member.summary: Allows only files in the specified categories.

member.name: M:MimeCheck.Validation.MimeValidatorBuilder.AllowImages
member.summary: Allows only image files.

member.name: M:MimeCheck.Validation.MimeValidatorBuilder.AllowDocuments
member.summary: Allows only document files.

member.name: M:MimeCheck.Validation.MimeValidatorBuilder.AllowArchives
member.summary: Allows only archive files.

member.name: M:MimeCheck.Validation.MimeValidatorBuilder.AllowAudio
member.summary: Allows only audio files.

member.name: M:MimeCheck.Validation.MimeValidatorBuilder.AllowVideo
member.summary: Allows only video files.

member.name: M:MimeCheck.Validation.MimeValidatorBuilder.AllowMedia
member.summary: Allows only media files (images, audio, video).

member.name: M:MimeCheck.Validation.MimeValidatorBuilder.MustBeImage
member.summary: Shorthand for allowing common image types.

member.name: M:MimeCheck.Validation.MimeValidatorBuilder.MustBeDocument
member.summary: Shorthand for allowing common document types.

member.name: M:MimeCheck.Validation.MimeValidatorBuilder.MustBe(System.String)
member.summary: Requires the file to match a specific MIME type.

member.name: M:MimeCheck.Validation.MimeValidatorBuilder.MustBe(MimeCheck.MimeCategory)
member.summary: Requires the file to match a specific category.

member.name: M:MimeCheck.Validation.MimeValidatorBuilder.DenyMimeTypes(System.String[])
member.summary: Denies the specified MIME types.

member.name: M:MimeCheck.Validation.MimeValidatorBuilder.DenyCategories(MimeCheck.MimeCategory)
member.summary: Denies files in the specified categories.

member.name: M:MimeCheck.Validation.MimeValidatorBuilder.DenyExecutables
member.summary: Denies executable files.

member.name: M:MimeCheck.Validation.MimeValidatorBuilder.MustNotBe(System.String)
member.summary: Shorthand for denying a specific MIME type.

member.name: M:MimeCheck.Validation.MimeValidatorBuilder.MustNotBe(MimeCheck.MimeCategory)
member.summary: Shorthand for denying a specific category.

member.name: M:MimeCheck.Validation.MimeValidatorBuilder.MaxSize(System.Int64)
member.summary: Sets the maximum allowed file size in bytes.

member.name: M:MimeCheck.Validation.MimeValidatorBuilder.MaxSizeKB(System.Int64)
member.summary: Sets the maximum allowed file size in kilobytes.

member.name: M:MimeCheck.Validation.MimeValidatorBuilder.MaxSizeMB(System.Int64)
member.summary: Sets the maximum allowed file size in megabytes.

member.name: M:MimeCheck.Validation.MimeValidatorBuilder.MinSize(System.Int64)
member.summary: Sets the minimum required file size in bytes.

member.name: M:MimeCheck.Validation.MimeValidatorBuilder.RequireKnownType
member.summary: Requires the file type to be recognized.

member.name: M:MimeCheck.Validation.MimeValidatorBuilder.ValidateExtension
member.summary: Validates that the file extension matches the detected MIME type.

member.summary: Executes the validation and returns the result.

member.summary: Executes the validation asynchronously and returns the result.

member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the validation passed.

member.summary: Gets the detection result from the validation.
